paper_title.ja: 学校と地域を結ぶ環境教育
住民の意識調査にみるクリーク地域の水環境評価
paper_title.en: Evaluation of Water Environments according to an Investigation of Inhabitants' Consciousness in the Creek Region

description.ja: 近年都市化と近代化によりクリーク地域の伝統的な生活と地域社会の変化が余儀なくされ, また筑後川の水資源の合理化と近代的農業を目指した大規模な土地改良事業が広範囲に実施され, 昔のクリークの景観は一変した。そこで本研究はクリーク地域の水環境に関して地域住民がどのように評価し, どのような整備を望んでいるのか, 住民のアンケートから実態と意識の両側面を把握し, 今後のクリークの在り方を模索する素材とすることを目的としている。大木町の3集落を対象とした調査結果では, クリークの重要性は評価されているが, 汚濁と安全性に問題があり, 自然性や親水性を持ったエコロジカルな整備への要望が強いことが把握された。
description.en: The Ariake creek region has an unique environment. However, a large farmland improvement project in the Chikugo river basin has recently led to the re organization of the water system and creek networks. This has profound influence on the region. We therefore investigate inhabitants' consciousness about evaluation of creek environments and what their improvement should be. Most of inhabitants recognize that creeks are polluted and dangerous but important. They desire natural, accessible and ecological improvement of creeks.

description.en: The Ariake creek region has an unique environment. However, a large farmland improvement project in the Chikugo river basin has recently led to the re organization of the water system and creek networks. This has profound influence on the region. We therefore investigate inhabitants' consciousness about evaluation of creek environments and what their improvement should be. Most of inhabitants recognize that creeks are polluted and dangerous but important. They desire natural, accessible and ecological improvement of creeks.
